meanings.sent1: The scoters swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of scoters diving for fish near the shore.
meanings.sent3: The scoters decided to have a race to see who could swim the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The scoters glided across the water like elegant dancers.
meanings.sent5: The colorful scoters stood out against the blue waves.

meanings.sent1: We spotted a flock of scoters flying overhead.
meanings.sent2: The scoters gathered together on the rocky beach.
meanings.sent3: The scoters held a meeting to discuss their migration plans.
meanings.sent4: The scoters in the pond resembled a floating patch of darkness.
meanings.sent5: The loud calls of the scoters echoed through the bay.
